title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively when resizing the window vertically.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Run the control example.
2. Resize the window vertically and observe the excessive flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
